title: Enable all champs in aram.
body:
So sick of seeing the same champs over and over and over and over again. EVERYONE in this server has ziggs (partially because we all got gifted him at the start) but that means he is in far more games than say Yorick. I have seen Yorick in aram probably twice in my whole lol lifetime, and one of these was me.
so lets just enable all champs on aram and so there is a even chance of getting any champ. is not all 'Random' all mid if its only randomised between a few champs. it also prevents people who only play aram starting a new account and only purchasing Ziggs, xerath, jayce, nidalee ect.

i know this has been considered before, but why did it not reach the live servers? what were the issues?

replies.body: ARAM gives you a random champ out of those you own and the current rotation. Got stuck with Taric once and had never played him
lol i thought i was the only one considering making a new account and getting aram op champs. you could literally just get like annie and garen then save up for darius and the ranged pokers
